whatIsKepler.title: WHAT IS KEPLER?
whatIsKepler.subtitle: A modern way to track your entertainment
whatIsKepler.description1: Kepler is a personal movie and TV series tracker that helps you organize and remember your favorite content. Think of it as your digital entertainment notebook where you can save movies and shows you've watched or want to watch in the future.
whatIsKepler.description2: With a clean, intuitive interface and powerful features, Kepler makes it easy to build and manage your personal media library.

howToUse.title: HOW TO USE KEPLER
howToUse.subtitle: Getting started is simple and straightforward

createAccount.title: 1. Create an Account
createAccount.description: Sign up for a free account to start building your personal library. Your data will be securely stored and accessible from any device.

browseContent.title: 2. Browse Content
browseContent.description: Search for your favorite movies and TV series using the search function. Browse through detailed information, cast, and related content.

buildLibrary.title: 3. Build Your Library
buildLibrary.description: Add items to your library with a single click. Your collection will grow as you save more content, creating your personalized entertainment database.

customizeExperience.title: 4. Customize Your Experience
customizeExperience.description: Adjust settings to match your preferences. Choose between light and dark themes, select your preferred language, and customize display options for content details.
